Docs.summary: Provides theme settings for activity designers that use a preview mode on the workflow design surface. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
Activity designers that use preview mode on the workflow design surface can have theme settings specific to the preview display area. ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme contains the properties that provide these preview-area specific settings.
Activities that provide a preview mode when they are added to the workflow design surface include <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity>.

Docs.summary: Notifies the that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks OnAmbientPropertyChanged checks the value passed to `ambientProperty` and applies the appropriate ambient theme settings based on that value. If the value is <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>, it applies the ambient styles provided by the designer. If the value is <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>, it applies the ambient styles provided by the operating system.
